name: The Old Schoolhouse Magazine
description: Congregate at TOS for homeschool motivation galoreany time, any place!  The Old Schoolhouse Magazine App serves up a banquet of interactive information for homeschoolers. Devour a steady diet of wisdom, curriculum recommendations and helpful ideas freshly prepared by experienced home educators. Nourish your mind and soul with ideas, resources, and motivation and make this your most satisfying homeschool year ever.  Magazine Features:   Current and several past issues of TOS magazine included at no extra charge.   Download each issue, and then return at your convenience for off-line reading.   Search available issues.   Bookmark your favorite articles.   Tour a homeschool classroom each month via video. Reality Homeschooling!   Watch videos, product demos in 3D or slideshows from columnists and other contributors.  Dont homeschool alone. Join The Old Schoolhouse Magazine, the interactive community for home educators. Connect with homeschoolers around the globe and be encouraged as homeschool veterans reach out to you with wit and wisdom with the TOS mobile App.   Youll also receive real-time updates from TOS:   The Homeschooling with Heart Blog   Curriculum and product reviews   More coming!  All in one convenient app! Download today and join the community!  ____________________  This application is powered by GTxcel, a leader in digital publishing technology, provider of hundreds of online digital publications and mobile magazine apps.
